name: OOFO
description:
You must traverse a city to find your missing alien friend, by following the transmissions coming in said direction.  Be wary though! The people have put down spotlights to keep you from finding your friend, avoid them at all costs by going invisible(space bar) or you might get shot down. Good Luck!

This was also a game made in 48hrs for the Global Game Jam. It is still in active development and many of the textures, models, mechanics, etc. are open and prone to change.

I would love and appreciate constructive criticism in the comments!
